activities: Accellion collects personal information only from end user who elect to use Accellion services. The types of personal information collected include a registrants name, address, company, email address and telephone number, and if the end user orders products from us through the Accellion website, any financial and commercial information provided by the end user but only for that purpose. The personal information provided by end users is used to provide services to end users and to contact end users about Accellion services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Mobile application data, online data. Does not include manually processed data
recoursemech: JAMS mediation may be commenced as provided for in the JAMS International Mediation Rules.
